name: Expensive Fish & Where to Get Them

description.value: The book quickly delves into details about various fishing areas; however, much of the information appears incomplete or misleading. It is commonly sold in taverns by self-proclaimed famous fishermen, often targeting unskilled commoners as part of a get-rich-quick scheme. The basic premise encourages readers to simply head to the nearest body of water, catch whatever they can, and sell it for profit. Throughout the book, a recurring tagline is used as an incentive: "One catch can change your life. Here's how!"
